Package gov.lbl.glamm.server

Interface Summary
FormRequestHandler.LineParser Interface for parsing of tab-delimited lines in files.
RequestHandler Interface for non-RPC (i.e.
 

Class Summary
ConfigurationManager Manages GLAMM server configurations as defined in the server_config.xml file.
FormRequestHandler Handles parsing of uploaded tab-delimited files.
GlammDbConnectionPool Wrapper for the c3p0 connection pool manager, used for raw JDBC calls independent of Hibernate.
GlammServiceImpl RPC service for glamm
GlammServlet The GlammServlet class extends HttpServlet.
GlammSession Manages GLAMM session data.
RequestHandlerFactory Factory class for request handlers
ResponseHandler Abstract class containing static methods for handling a variety of response types.
ServerConfig Describes the configuration of a GLAMM server.
ServerConfig.DbConfig Describes the configuration of the underlying database associated with a GLAMM server.
 

Enum Summary
ServerConfig.Attribute ServerConfig attributes and their XML tags.
ServerConfig.DbConfig.Attribute DbConfig attributes and their XML tags.
